Class DiscreteDistribution

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.statistics.DiscreteDistribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<Real,Real>, ContinuousFunction<Real,Real>, Function<Real,Real>, Relation<Real,Real>, ProbabilityDistribution
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinomialDistribution, GeometricDistribution, PoissonDistribution
public abstract class DiscreteDistribution extends Object implements ProbabilityDistribution
Abstract base class for discrete probability distributions.

Uses Real for all calculations.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • quantile

      public Real quantile(Real probability)
      Description copied from interface: ProbabilityDistribution
      Quantile function (inverse CDF). Q(p) = F⁻¹(p)
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
